# tg_group (Data Source)

Fetch a user group.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "tg_group" "existing-group" {
  uid = "your-group-uid"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `uid` (String) ID

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `idp_id` (String) IDP id - either local or the IDP uid
- `name` (String) Name
